title: when and how much was the land on 814 Piner Road wilmington nc sold 5.7 acres of land
text:
Here's a link to how to find property records in the area:



http://www.myreporter.com/2017/03/how-can-i-find-out-how-much-local-property-is-worth/



I looked up 814 Piner Road, which was last sold in 2008 for $160,000, but it also says that parcel is just one acre. It is largely surrounded by larger parcels (adding up to much more than 5 acres) owned by Bill Clark Homes. Most of those were sold last spring.
